hgr::ResourceManager Class Reference
[Hierarchical graphics library]

#include <ResourceManager.h>

Inheritance diagram for hgr::ResourceManager:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Abstract base class for managing and sharing rendering resources.


Public Member Functions

virtual gr::CubeTexture * getCubeTexture (const lang::String &filename)=0
